Samia Suluhu Hassan (amụrụ 27 Jenụwarị 1960) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tanzania na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi nke isii na ugbu a onye isi ala Tanzania
Ọ bụ onye otu pati social-democrat Chama Cha Mapinduzi (CCM) na-achị
Suluhu bụ nwanyị nke atọ onye isi ọchịchị nke obodo East African Community (EAC), na-esote Sylvie Kinigi na Burundi na Agathe Uwilingiyimana na Rwanda, ma bụrụkwa onye isi ala nwanyị mbụ nke Tanzania
Ọ malitere ọrụ na 19 Maachị 2021 ka Onye isi ala John Magufuli nwụsịrị na 17 Maachị 2021.
Onye obodo Zanzibar,  Suluhu ruru oru dịka minista na okara-onwe ogbe na oge ọchịchị onye isi ala Amani Karume
Oruru oru dịka onye otu nzuko omeiwu na mkpaghara Makunduchi site na afo 2010 ruo 2015 ma burukwa Minista nke Steeti na ulo oru osote onye isi oche nke ihe gbasara otu site na afo 2010 ruo na 2015
Na afo 2014, a horo ya ka oburu osote onye isi oche nke Constituent Assembly e nyere oru idebe iwu ọhụrụ nke obodo.
